title: Advanced Blockchain AG
body: Just as terms changed and took on new meaning as the internet evolved, we may see similar progressions in the crypto world. Either way, staying informed is key. Do you know the difference between #blockchain and #DLT?

title: Advanced Blockchain AG
body: The #Blockchain, #Tangle & Beyond event series took the Advanced Blockchain AG team to North America. CEO Michael Geike gave his first presentations of 2018 alongside #IOTA Developers and members of the IOTA Foundation. @iotatoken
